Today in Pembrokeshire, it's a solid 6 ft @10s WSW with fresh 11 mph S winds. Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay are your go-to spots, both offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @10s SW with light 2 mph SE winds, keeping it mellow and manageable. By the day after, the swell picks back up to 4 ft @8s WSW with moderate 7 mph S winds, making for fun surf at various spots. Best: today.
